metadata.name: Nayomi - the record store_best of (2022)
metadata.description:
This ERC-1155 token is the digital collectible version of generative AI artist* Nayomi's "the record store_best of (2022)" album release, comprised of the best tracks from her weekly WarpSound EP releases in 2022. This NFT was originally claimable exclusively by WVRPS token holders.

Track Listing:  
1. Wormhole  
2. Lost Lightpipe  
3. Hotel PC Performa  
4. Journey to the Center of My Neural Network  
5. Souls and Evanescent Signs of Life  
6. Shoddy Underground Tech  
7. The Longest File Sync  
8. Digital Photons  
9. No FUNction  
10. Sweatshirt In June, Oh

[Interactive Player In-Browser Link](https://cdn.warpsound.ai/ipfs/QmVYW5vHaV322Kvp2So5ErngP1PrDUneYqo4e9TNygAGSn?playlist-url=https://cdn.warpsound.ai/ipfs/QmTSmGiSbjEWCYjSWrPXFh265uq69BosjRkB268obrcjgt/Nayomi_bestof_2022-playlist.json) 

* Nayomi is a generative AI artist who composes and produces all of her own original music.

This token utilizes two new web3 innovations - a) WarpSound's new IPFS-hosted NFT Player Template and b) WarpSound's Playlist Metadata Standard. These innovations allow for both in-browser play directly from the token itself, and for web3-native NFT music players/platforms to utilize the Playlist Metadata Standard to play and group the tracks into native playlist(s) automatically.

This NFT is licensed to the holder solely for personal copy & display usage and may not be used for any commercial purposes or to create derivatives of any kind. All other rights to the music and artwork are expressly reserved by WarpSound.
